name.zh_CN,zh_TW: 保存 ChatGPT DALL·E-3 对话记录到飞书

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save ChatGPT conversations to Feishu with one click. Export ChatGPT conversations
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 一键保存 ChatGPT 对话到飞书。导出 ChatGPT 对话

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,es_4:
ChatGPT to Feishu is a Chrome extension that allows users to save ChatGPT conversations to Feishu with just one click. 

"Save ChatGPT to Feishu" is a Google Chrome Browser extension that provides a convenient and quick way to save ChatGPT chat records to Feishu. Users can automatically save chat records to Feishu with a one-click operation. The plugin is easy to use, highly efficient, and accurate, which can significantly improve users' efficiency and convenience in learning, working, and daily management. The plugin provides FAQs to address common questions.
